title: GoUnderDomTower
body:
[img]/assets/data-models/stories/20201000034_oracle_end/Utrechtbasilisk_1.png[/img]

The basilisk is hiding in the passage under the Dom Tower.


The basilisk sees you. 

It starts rattling its scales. 

It leans towards you, orienting its deadly gaze towards your face. 

A thunderstorm began to growl in its throat.

[[ Look |Death end]] [[ Avert your eyes |Continue]]

title: Death end
body:
[img]/assets/data-models/stories/20201000034_oracle_end/bertken.png[/img]

"You fool! You have doomed us all!"

[img]/assets/data-models/stories/20201000034_oracle_end/Utrechtbasilisk_1.png[/img]


Basilisk: Screeeeeechhh 


"Can you hear it? 

The Basilisk is celebrating its victory."


The Basilisk dances in victory. 


The rift opens and swallows everything in Utrecht and spreads through the world. 

The screen goes white. 

"Congratulations the world has ended because of you!"

[[ Oh No! I didn't look |Continue]]  [[Ok, fine by me |end game coward]]

title: GotoEnd2
body:
[img]/assets/data-models/stories/20201000034_oracle_end/bertken.png[/img]

"Congratulations Chosen One, you have saved the World!"


"Here is your reward, take a screenshot now before it goes away"

 [[pick up reward|pick up reward button]]

title: Use sun button
body:
[img]/assets/data-models/stories/20201000034_oracle_end/Utrechtbasilisk_1.png[/img]

You take the Sun and put it in front of your face.


The basilisk jumps back with an angry snarl. 

But it is too late. 

His deadly power is transforming him into a statue. 

The statue shatters. 

The Stone transforms into dust and is aspirated by the time rift. 

The rift slowly closes. 

The Basilisk is defeated.

[[Victory!|GotoEnd2]]
